product_overview: A comprehensive student learning platform providing authentication, batch exploration, course content navigation, video playback, quizzes, and study material access in an intuitive web application.
core_goals: Enable secure user and admin authentication with role-based access.
Allow students to explore, enroll, and manage learning batches.
Provide structured navigation through subjects, chapters, and associated course content.
Integrate a robust video player for lecture playback.
Offer supplementary learning resources like DPPs and PDFs.
Provide an admin dashboard for batch and content management.
key_features: User and Admin Login with protected routes based on authentication state.
Explore available batches with detailed batch information and enrollment options.
View personal enrolled batches and their progress.
Navigate course content by subject and chapters within each batch.
Integrated video player for seamless lecture video playback.
Access downloadable PDFs and Daily Practice Problems (DPP) related to course material.
Quiz functionality to test student knowledge on the content delivered.
Admin dashboard with capabilities to create and manage batches, content, and view metrics.
user_flow_summary: User visits login page, authenticates, and is redirected according to role.
Authenticated users explore batches and enroll in preferred batches.
Users access enrolled batches and navigate to subjects, chapters, and videos.
Users watch lecture videos via the integrated player with controls.
Users download relevant PDFs and DPPs for study support.
Users take quizzes to assess their learning.
Admins log in and access the dashboard to create batches and manage content.
Admins monitor platform metrics and user engagement via dashboard.
validation_criteria: Successful authentication and authorization with appropriate route protection.
Batch exploration loads correct batch lists and details dynamically.
Course content navigation reflects accurate subject and chapter hierarchy.
Video player functions correctly with smooth playback and context management.
PDFs and DPPs are accessible and downloadable without errors.
Quizzes load correctly and record responses reliably.
Admin functions execute batch creation and content management as expected.
Profile information displays and updates correctly.
Application routing works without dead ends or unauthorized access.

features.name: Authentication
features.description: User and Admin login functionality, including protected route management and authentication state context.

features.name: Batch Management
features.description: Features for users to explore available batches, view their enrolled batches, and see detailed batch information.

features.name: Course Content
features.description: Navigation and display of subjects and chapters within a batch.

features.name: Video Player
features.description: Context and logic for video playback within the application.

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Administrative interface for creating batches, managing content, and viewing dashboard metrics.

features.name: API Services
features.description: Supabase client configuration and API service functions for data fetching.
